title: Playtime with the Guys
itunes:title: Playtime with the Guys
description:
Today on the show we had LaTosha Brown & Cliff Albright from the organization "Black Folks Matter" who spoke about why black voters natter, holding Politicians accountable and more. Also for Freaky Freaky Friday we opened up the phone lines to see if any of our male listeners have "play time" with their friends after rapper Turks commented about all guys playing "gay games". Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to Detroit Lions head coach Dan Campbell on cutting 17-year Lions veteran Don Muhlbach on his 40th birthday

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Today on the show we had LaTosha Brown & Cliff Albright from the organization "Black Folks Matter" who spoke about why black voters natter, holding Politicians accountable and more. Also for Freaky Freaky Friday we opened up the phone lines to see if any of our male listeners have "play time" with their friends after rapper Turks commented about all guys playing "gay games". Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to Detroit Lions head coach Dan Campbell on cutting 17-year Lions veteran Don Muhlbach on his 40th birthday
